text: Hi Nicolas, unfortunately HubSpot does not publish IP addresses or IP ranges for requests coming from its server, since they change so frequently. If you’re looking to verify that a request is coming from HubSpot, I’d recommend taking a look at our <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/webhooks/validating-requests|docs on validating requests from HubSpot>

Hey Michael, we use request signatures to authenticate requests from HubSpot to another app. <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/webhooks/validating-requests|Docs are available here> (workflows uses the v2 request signature, as noted in the <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/automation/custom-workflow-actions|custom automation action docs> under “validate the request source”)
